name: My Little Pony: Fighting is Magic - Tribute Edition
summary: My Little Pony: Fighting is Magic - Tribute Edition is a fan-made continuation of the My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic fan-game "My Little Pony: Fighting is Magic", which was a fighting game developed by Mane6 that later was rebranded into "Them's Fightin' Herds". The game is based off leaked early builds of the project, which were posted on 4Chan in 2012.
